data.eml:eml: A new miniature species of the milliped genus Cleidogona from Costa Rica (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida, Cleidogonidae), with a review of Central American Cleidogonidae

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shear, William A. (2013): A new miniature species of the milliped genus Cleidogona from Costa Rica (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida, Cleidogonidae), with a review of Central American Cleidogonidae. Zootaxa 3635 (1): 87-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3635.1.9
